sourcesContent:
import React, { createContext, useState } from "react"
 import CompC from "./CompC"
 import CompA from "./CompA"
 import "./index.css"
  const Firstname = createContext();
 const App = ()=>{
     let [item, Set] = useState(0)
     function Inc(){
         item+=1
         Set(item)
     }
    return (
        <>
        
         <button onClick ={Inc}> add cart</button>
         <CompA 
           name="honda" 
           price="45" 
         />
          <CompA 
           name="maruti" 
           price="405" 
         />
          <CompA 
           name="honda" 
           price="45" 
         />
         <Firstname.Provider value={item}>
            <CompC />
         </Firstname.Provider>
        
        

        </>
    )
        
   }
    
 export default App;
 export {Firstname}
